remarks: Two ways to express the class of non-limit ordinal numbers.  Part of Definition 7.27 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 42, who use the symbol K_I for this class.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Nov-2004.)
statement:
nlimon $p |- { x e. On | ( x = (/) \/ E. y e. On x = suc y ) } = { x e. On | -. Lim x } $.
$d x y $.
